title: Zendaya wore the same suit as Michael B. Jordan and his comment on who wore it best is priceless
text:
Zendaya took over the red carpet in a gray Berluti suit at the Harper's Bazaar ICONS party on Friday in New York City.

The chic look might have seemed familiar to a few fashion fans. That's because the star was wearing the same suit actor Michael B. Jordan wore to the 2019 Vanity Fair Oscar Party in February.

The twinning moment drew many jokes and comparisons across social media, and Zendaya's stylist and collaborator, Law Roach, even jumped in on the fun.

Getty Images

"Who you got Z or B???? wearing @berluti," he captioned his Instagram post featuring their looks.

Jordan himself decided to cast a vote. In response to The Shade Room's post featuring the looks and asking who wore it best, Jordan commented, "@zendaya hands down no contest 😌."

Zendaya hasn't weighed in yet but seems to be having a good time experimenting with different styles during New York Fashion Week.
description: Zendaya and Michael B. Jordan both opted for a gray Berluti suit for red carpet events.
